environment
Class AbstractTwoPlayerState

java.lang.Object
  environment.AbstractTwoPlayerState
All Implemented Interfaces:
IState, ITwoPlayerState, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MemoryState, StateJenga, TicTacToeState
public abstract class AbstractTwoPlayerState
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITwoPlayerState

Wrapping Interface State and define some common behaviors.

Author:
Francesco De Comite
See Also:
